content.raw:
Hm, agreed that we should spend some time on the right panel.

In the meantime, would this fix be correct? 

"The right panel...open it. The right panel can be used to interact with the mobile parts of a selected model (the
joints). If there are no models selected  in the Scene, the panel does not display any information. Currently,
if forces are applied to a static model (meaning it is not affected by physics), the model will not move."
content.html:
Hm, agreed that we should spend some time on the right panel.

In the meantime, would this fix be correct?

"The right panel...open it. The right panel can be used to interact with the mobile parts of a selected model (the joints). If there are no models selected in the Scene, the panel does not display any information. Currently, if forces are applied to a static model (meaning it is not affected by physics), the model will not move."
